price: 54. Na boye nde abangisaki bato naye mpe batosi ye. Ya soló, bazalaki bato mabe.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَخَفَّ قَوۡمَهُۥ فَأَطَاعُوهُۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-is'takhaffa qawmahu fa-aṭāʿūhu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
